mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(cashbook_date) year, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=1 then cashbook_price END), 0) january, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=2 then cashbook_price END), 0) february, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=3 then cashbook_price END), 0) march, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=4 then cashbook_price END), 0) april, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=5 then cashbook_price END), 0) may, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=6 then cashbook_price END), 0) june, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=7 then cashbook_price END), 0) july, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=8 then cashbook_price END), 0) august, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=9 then cashbook_price END), 0) september, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=10 then cashbook_price END), 0) october, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=11 then cashbook_price END), 0) november, nvl(sum(case when month(cashbook_date)=12 then cashbook_price END), 0) december FROM cashbook WHERE YEAR(cashbook_date) = #{year} AND cashbook_kind = "지출"
